Jx.Field.Spinner

A Jx.Widget that provides a Text Field with two buttons that fires events

Example

new Jx.Field.Spinner({
        label: 'Spin Field',
        onSpinUp: function(){
                alert("spin up click event");
        },
        onSpinDown: function(){
                alert("spin down click event");
        }
})

Extends

Jx.Field.Text

Author: Ing.  Axel Mendoza Pupo.

Extends: Jx.Field
